Name: Double Grape
Ingredients: 52.5 ml BarSol Mosto Verde Italia Pisco
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and 2 red grapes..
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and discard.
Review: The aromatics of the distilled wine of pisco combine harmoniously with the aromatised wine's sweet grapey notes.
History: Created by yours truly (Simon Difford) at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
